snippets.title: Card avec Chart Semi-Circulaire
snippets.description: Une carte avec un graphique semi-circulaire montrant la progression des tâches
snippets.yaml:
- Card:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Semibold
      Fill: =RGBA(246, 246, 246, 0.5)
      Height: =317
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
      LayoutGap: =20
      LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
      PaddingBottom: =20
      PaddingLeft: =50
      PaddingRight: =50
      PaddingTop: =20
      RadiusBottomLeft: =10
      RadiusBottomRight: =10
      RadiusTopLeft: =10
      RadiusTopRight: =10
      Width: =479
      X: =384
      Y: =220
    Children:
      - legend_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            Height: =35
            LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
            LayoutGap: =20
            LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
            LayoutMinHeight: =32
            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =298
            X: =97
            Y: =211
          Children:
            - left_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =120
                Children:
                  - left_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(113, 50, 251, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - left_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="Done"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
            - right_legend_frame:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =28
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =16.884349822998047
                  LayoutMinHeight: =32
                  LayoutMinWidth: =32
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =150
                  X: =169
                Children:
                  - right_legend:
                      Control: Circle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(217, 217, 217, 1)
                        Height: =23
                        Width: =23
                        Y: =2
                  - right_title_value:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: ="Inter"
                        Height: =33
                        LayoutMinWidth: =50
                        Size: =18
                        Text: ="To Do"
                        Width: =80
                        X: =40
      - content_chart:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: ManualLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            Height: =195
            LayoutMinHeight: =32
            LayoutMinWidth: =32
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =393
            X: =49
            Y: =287
          Children:
            - img_chart:
                Control: Image@2.2.3
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                  Height: =195
                  Image: |
                    ="https://quickchart.io/chart?c=" & EncodeUrl("{
                      'type': 'doughnut',
                      'data': {
                        'datasets': [{
                          'label': 'foo',
                          'data': [50,50],
                          'backgroundColor': [
                            '#7132FB',
                            'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)'
                          ],
                          'textcolor':['#000555','#555555'],
                          'borderWidth': 0,
                        }] 
                      },
                      'options': {
                        'rotation': Math.PI,
                        'circumference': Math.PI,
                        'cutoutPercentage': 75,
                        'plugins': {
                          'datalabels': { 'display': false },
                          'doughnutlabel': {
                            'labels': [
                              {
                                'text': '
Tasks',
                                'color': '#aaa',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '32'
                                },
                              },
                              {
                                'text': '
20%',
                                'font': {
                                  'size': '44'
                                },
                              },
                            ]
                          }
                        }		
                      }
                    }
                    ")
                  Width: =379

snippets.title: Galerie 3 Cards responsive
snippets.description: Une galerie avec 3 cards qui sont responsive
snippets.yaml:
- ctn_gal_:
    Control: GroupContainer
    Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
      Height: =Parent.Height
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
      LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
      LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
      Width: =Parent.Width
      X: =(Parent.Width-Self.Width)/2
      Y: =(Parent.Height-Self.Height)/2
    Children:
    - gal_:
        Control: Gallery
        Variant: BrowseLayout_Vertical_TwoTextOneImageVariant_ver5.0
        Properties:
          Items: =
          WrapCount: =3
          AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
          DelayItemLoading: =true
          Layout: =Layout.Vertical
          LoadingSpinner: =LoadingSpinner.Data
          ShowScrollbar: =false
          TemplatePadding: =10
          TemplateSize: =200
        Children:
        - ctn_card_horizontal:
            Control: GroupContainer
            Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
            Properties:
              Fill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
              Height: '=Parent.TemplateHeight '
              LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
              Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
            Children:
            - ctn_card_vertical:
                Control: GroupContainer
                Variant: verticalAutoLayoutContainer
                Properties:
                  AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                  LayoutMinWidth: =0
                  LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto

snippets.title: Stepper avec Étapes
snippets.description:
Un composant Stepper affichant les étapes et leur état. 
 Il faut remplacer la valeur _VARIABLE_ par votre variable d'étape (int)
snippets.yaml:
- ctnSteper:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: ManualLayout
    Properties:
      AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.SetByContainer
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.Regular
      FillPortions: =0
      Height: =125
      Width: =700
    Children:
      - galSteper:
          Control: Gallery@2.15.0
          Variant: Horizontal
          Properties:
            Height: =Parent.Height
            Items: =Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})
            TemplatePadding: =
            TemplateSize: =(Self.Width - (Self.TemplatePadding * (Self.AllItemsCount+1)))/Self.AllItemsCount
            Width: =Parent.Width
          Children:
            - ctnRec:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: ManualLayout
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(215, 58, 60, 1)
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                Children:
                  - recRight:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step = Last(Table({Step:1,Name:"Step 1",Description:"Description"},{Step:2,Name:"Step 2",Description:"Description"},{Step:3,Name:"Step 3",Description:"Description"})).Step,false,true)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        X: =Parent.Width/2 + ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =recLeft.Y
                  - recLeft:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Height: =2
                        Visible: =If(ThisItem.Step > 1,true,false)
                        Width: =Parent.Width/2 - ctnCircle.Width/2
                        Y: =ctnCircle.Y + ctnCircle.Height/2 - Self.Height/2
            - Container9:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Self.PaddingTop - Self.PaddingBottom
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                  LayoutGap: =10
                  PaddingBottom: =5
                  PaddingTop: =5
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                  X: =(Parent.TemplateWidth-Self.Width)/2
                  Y: =(Parent.TemplateHeight-Self.Height)/2
                Children:
                  - ctnCircle:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: ManualLayout
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        FillPortions: =0
                        Height: =40
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                        Width: =40
                      Children:
                        - imgSteperImg:
                            Control: Image@2.2.3
                            Properties:
                              Fill: =Color.Transparent
                              Height: =40
                              Image: "=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,\"#.#\")),_VARIABLE), \"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, \"&EncodeUrl(\"<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' fill='#003da5' stroke='#003da5' stroke-width='2'/></svg>\"), \"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, \"&EncodeUrl(\"<svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 26 26' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><circle cx='13' cy='13' r='12' stroke='#101014' stroke-width='2'/></svg>\"))"
                              Width: =40
                        - ctnStepNum:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              Font: =Font.'Lato Black'
                              FontColor: '=If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), Color.White,Color.Black)'
                              Height: =Parent.Height
                              Text: =ThisItem.Step
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Width: =Parent.Width
                  - Container5:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: AutoLayout
                      Properties:
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                        LayoutMinHeight: =0
                        LayoutMinWidth: =0
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                      Children:
                        - lblSteperName:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              Size: =13
                              Text: =ThisItem.Name
                              VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Middle
                              Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                              Width: =200
                        - lblSteperDescription:
                            Control: Text@0.0.50
                            Properties:
                              Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              FillPortions: =1
                              FontColor: =If(ThisItem.Step = If(_VARIABLE > 3,Value(Text(_VARIABLE,"#.#")),_VARIABLE), ColorValue("#003da5"),Color.Black)
                              Height: =45
                              LayoutMinHeight: =0
                              LayoutMinWidth: =galSteper.TemplateWidth
                              PaddingTop: =5
                              Size: =11
                              Text: =ThisItem.Description
                              Width: =200

snippets.title: Ecran avec galerie
snippets.description: Un contrôle qui met en avant une galerie
snippets.yaml:
- ctlContainer:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      Fill: =RGBA(250, 249, 248, 1)
      Height: =Parent.Height
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
      PaddingBottom: =40
      PaddingLeft: =40
      PaddingRight: =40
      PaddingTop: =10
      Width: =Parent.Width
    Children:
      - ctlLblHeader:
          Control: Label@2.5.1
          Properties:
            AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
            BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
            Font: =Font.Lato
            FontWeight: =FontWeight.Semibold
            Height: =80
            Size: =18
            Text: ="Header"
      - ctlLblDescription:
          Control: Label@2.5.1
          Properties:
            AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
            BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
            Font: =Font.Lato
            Height: =80
            Text: ="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisici"
            VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Top
      - ctlContainer1:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.Regular
            Fill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
          Children:
            - ctlContainer2:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(246, 245, 244, 1)
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Fill: =RGBA(243, 242, 241, 1)
                  FillPortions: =0
                  Height: =50
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  PaddingLeft: =20
                  PaddingRight: =20
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                Children:
                  - btnButtoncanvas:
                      Control: Button@0.0.44
                      Properties:
                        Font: =Font.Lato
                        Icon: ="Add"
                        Text: ="Nouveau"
                        Width: =120
            - ctlContainer3:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(237, 237, 237, 1)
                  BorderThickness: =1
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  Fill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
                  FillPortions: =0
                  Height: =50
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  PaddingLeft: =20
                  PaddingRight: =20
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                Children:
                  - ctlLabel:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: =Font.Lato
                        FontWeight: =FontWeight.Semibold
                        Text: ="Sample Heading"
                  - ctlLabel2:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =3
                        Font: =Font.Lato
                        FontWeight: =FontWeight.Semibold
                        Text: ="Sample Text"
            - galGallery:
                Control: Gallery@2.15.0
                Variant: Vertical
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                  TemplateSize: =50
                Children:
                  - ctlContainer4:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: AutoLayout
                      Properties:
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Parent.TemplatePadding*2
                        LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                        PaddingLeft: =20
                        PaddingRight: =20
                        RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                        RadiusBottomRight: =0
                        RadiusTopLeft: =0
                        RadiusTopRight: =0
                        Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth - Parent.TemplatePadding*2
                      Children:
                        - ctlLabel21:
                            Control: Label@2.5.1
                            Properties:
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              Color: =RGBA(79, 90, 94, 1)
                              FillPortions: =1
                              Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
                              Live: =Live.Assertive
                              Text: =ThisItem.SampleHeading
                        - ctlLabel22:
                            Control: Label@2.5.1
                            Properties:
                              AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              Color: =RGBA(79, 90, 94, 1)
                              FillPortions: =3
                              Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
                              Text: =ThisItem.SampleText

snippets.title: PopUp
snippets.description: Il faut créer une variable(bool) afin de l'afficher ou non
snippets.yaml:
- ctlPopup:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: ManualLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
      Fill: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 0.25)
      Height: =Parent.Height
      RadiusBottomLeft: =0
      RadiusBottomRight: =0
      RadiusTopLeft: =0
      RadiusTopRight: =0
      Width: =Parent.Width
    Children:
      - ctlContainer_1:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            Fill: =RGBA(250, 249, 248, 1)
            Height: =500
            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
            LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.SpaceBetween
            PaddingBottom: =20
            PaddingLeft: =20
            PaddingRight: =20
            PaddingTop: =20
            Width: =600
            X: =(Parent.Width-Self.Width)/2
            Y: =(Parent.Height-Self.Height)/2
          Children:
            - ctlContainer1_1:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  FillPortions: =0
                  Height: =32
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =10
                  LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.End
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                Children:
                  - ctlCtllblheader:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        FillPortions: =1
                        Font: =Font.Lato
                        FontWeight: =FontWeight.Bold
                        Height: =80
                        LayoutMinHeight: =0
                        LayoutMinWidth: =0
                        Size: =14
                        Text: ="Description de l'action"
                  - ButtonCanvas5:
                      Control: Button@0.0.44
                      Properties:
                        Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Subtle
                        Icon: ="Dismiss"
                        Text: =""
                        Width: =32
            - ctlContainer8:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                  FillPortions: =0
                  Height: =32
                  LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                  LayoutGap: =10
                  LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.End
                  RadiusBottomLeft: =0
                  RadiusBottomRight: =0
                  RadiusTopLeft: =0
                  RadiusTopRight: =0
                Children:
                  - btnButtoncanvas2:
                      Control: Button@0.0.44
                      Properties:
                        Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Secondary
                        Text: ="Annuler"
                  - btnButtoncanvas21:
                      Control: Button@0.0.44
                      Properties:
                        Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Primary
                        IconStyle: ='ButtonCanvas.IconStyle'.Filled

snippets.title: Breadcrumbs
snippets.yaml:
- ctnBreadcrumbs:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
      Height: =50
      LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
      PaddingLeft: =5
      RadiusBottomLeft: =0
      RadiusBottomRight: =0
      RadiusTopLeft: =0
      RadiusTopRight: =0
      X: =40
      Y: =80
    Children:
      - ctnHome:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: ManualLayout
          Properties:
            DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
            FillPortions: =0
            LayoutMinHeight: =0
            PaddingLeft: =10
            PaddingRight: =10
            RadiusBottomLeft: =0
            RadiusBottomRight: =0
            RadiusTopLeft: =0
            RadiusTopRight: =0
            Width: =30
          Children:
            - imgHome:
                Control: Image@2.2.3
                Properties:
                  Height: =Parent.Height
                  Image: |-
                    ="data:image/svg+xml;utf8, "&EncodeUrl("<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='16' height='16' fill='currentColor' class='bi bi-house' viewBox='0 0 16 16'>
                      <path d='M8.707 1.5a1 1 0 0 0-1.414 0L.646 8.146a.5.5 0 0 0 .708.708L2 8.207V13.5A1.5 1.5 0 0 0 3.5 15h9a1.5 1.5 0 0 0 1.5-1.5V8.207l.646.647a.5.5 0 0 0 .708-.708L13 5.793V2.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.5-.5h-1a.5.5 0 0 0-.5.5v1.293zM13 7.207V13.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.5.5h-9a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5V7.207l5-5z'/>
                    </svg>")
                  PaddingLeft: =5
                  PaddingRight: =5
                  Width: =Parent.Width
            - btnHome:
                Control: Button@0.0.45
                Properties:
                  Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
                  Height: =imgHome.Height -15
                  OnSelect: =//Navigate()
                  Text: =""
                  Width: =imgHome.Width - 12
                  X: =imgHome.X +6
                  Y: =imgHome.Y +9
      - imgRight:
          Control: Classic/Icon@2.5.0
          Properties:
            AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
            Color: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
            DisplayMode: =DisplayMode.View
            Icon: =Icon.ChevronRight
            LayoutMinHeight: =0
            PaddingLeft: =10
            PaddingRight: =10
            Width: =30
            X: =40
            Y: =40
      - btnNav1:
          Control: Button@0.0.45
          Properties:
            Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
            OnSelect: =//Navigate()
            Text: ="Settings"
            Width: =60
      - imgRight2:
          Control: Classic/Icon@2.5.0
          Properties:
            AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
            Color: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
            DisplayMode: =DisplayMode.View
            Icon: =Icon.ChevronRight
            LayoutMinHeight: =0
            PaddingLeft: =10
            PaddingRight: =10
            Width: =30
            X: =40
            Y: =40
      - btnNav2:
          Control: Button@0.0.45
          Properties:
            Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
            OnSelect: =//Navigate()
            Text: ="Company"
            Width: =60

snippets.title: Top Navigation Basique
snippets.description: Navigation basique en haut de l'écran
snippets.yaml:
- ctnTopNav:
    Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
    Variant: AutoLayout
    Properties:
      DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
      Height: =If(_locMenuExpended, (50 + galSubLevel.AllItemsCount*40),50)
      LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
      LayoutGap: =10
      PaddingLeft: =10
      PaddingRight: =10
      RadiusBottomLeft: =0
      RadiusBottomRight: =0
      RadiusTopLeft: =0
      RadiusTopRight: =0
      Width: =Parent.Width
    Children:
      - imgLogo:
          Control: Image@2.2.3
          Properties:
            AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Start
            Height: =50
            Image: |-
              ="data:image/svg+xml;utf8, "&EncodeUrl("<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='300' height='100' viewBox='0 0 300 100' role='img' aria-labelledby='title'>
                <title id='title'>Logo texte</title>
                <text x='50%' y='50%' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle'
                      font-family='Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif' font-size='40' font-weight='700'>
                  LOGO
                </text>
              </svg>")
            LayoutMinHeight: =0
            Width: =150
      - galNav:
          Control: Gallery@2.15.0
          Variant: Horizontal
          Properties:
            Items: |-
              =Table(
                      {
                          Title:"Products",
                          PageLink: Screen1,
                          SubLevel : Table({
                              Title:"Blog",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                          {
                              Title:"Customer Stories",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          })
                      },
                      {
                          Title:"Services",
                          PageLink: Screen1,
                          SubLevel : Table({
                              Title:"Blog",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                          {
                              Title:"Customer Stories",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                                      {
                              Title:"Documentation",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                          {
                              Title:"Customer Stories",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                                      {
                              Title:"Documentation",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                          {
                              Title:"Customer Stories",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          },
                                      {
                              Title:"Documentation",
                              PageLink: Screen1
                          })
                      },{
                          Title:"About",
                          PageLink: Screen1 
                      }
              )
            LayoutMinHeight: =0
            TemplatePadding: =0
            TemplateSize: =(Self.Width - (Self.TemplatePadding * (Self.AllItemsCount+1)))/Self.AllItemsCount
            X: =604
            Y: =76
          Children:
            - btnClose:
                Control: Button@0.0.45
                Properties:
                  Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
                  Height: =ctnTopNav.Height
                  Icon: =
                  Layout: ='ButtonCanvas.Layout'.IconOnly
                  OnSelect: =UpdateContext({_locMenuExpended:false,_locMenuSelected:""})
                  Text: =""
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                  Y: =50
            - galSubLevel:
                Control: Gallery@2.15.0
                Variant: VariableHeight
                Properties:
                  Height: =Self.AllItemsCount*40
                  Items: =ThisItem.SubLevel
                  TemplatePadding: =0
                  TemplateSize: =150
                  Visible: =_locMenuSelected = ThisItem.Title
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                  Y: =50
                Children:
                  - btnItemTitle2:
                      Control: Button@0.0.45
                      Properties:
                        Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Primary
                        BasePaletteColor: =RGBA(70, 137, 189, 1)
                        Height: =40
                        OnSelect: =Navigate(ThisItem.PageLink)
                        Text: =ThisItem.Title
                        Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
            - btnItemTitle:
                Control: Button@0.0.45
                Properties:
                  Height: =50
                  Icon: =If(!IsBlank(ThisItem.SubLevel),If(_locMenuSelected = ThisItem.Title,"ChevronUp", "ChevronDown"))
                  Layout: ='ButtonCanvas.Layout'.IconAfter
                  OnSelect: |-
                    =If(!IsBlank(ThisItem.SubLevel),
                    UpdateContext({_locMenuExpended:If(_locMenuExpended && _locMenuSelected <> ThisItem.Title,true,!_locMenuExpended),_locMenuSelected:If(_locMenuSelected = ThisItem.Title,"",ThisItem.Title)}),
                    Navigate(ThisItem.PageLink))
                  Text: =ThisItem.Title
                  Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
      - imgUserImg:
          Control: Image@2.2.3
          Properties:
            Height: =50
            Image: =User().Image
            RadiusBottomLeft: =50
            RadiusBottomRight: =50
            RadiusTopLeft: =50
            RadiusTopRight: =50
            Width: =50
